title: NotATether
author: NotATether
content: I am making a mailing list for the bitocincleanup website (not live yet), but I am wary of using my personal address, and I don't have a PO Box. I want to stay on the safe side and use a real address (not a fake one), so if anybody reading this has a PO Box or some other business address they don't mind PM'ing me, it will save me a lot of trouble. Thanks in advance.It will not be used for sending/receiving any mail, it is strictly for CAN-SPAM compliance purposes only.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: No longer need this, I just used the address of the Bitcoin ATM belonging to Bitcoin NYC org.
